com.chinamobile.android.connectionmanager.manager

类 ConnectionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chinamobile.android.connectionmanager.manager.BaseManager
      • com.chinamobile.android.connectionmanager.manager.ConnectionManager

  • public class ConnectionManager
extends BaseManager
    the manager manage network connection

    receive WiFi or 3G status from system and notify to ServiceController
    can connect WiFi and 3G
    can open WiFi radio and scan

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      boolean isStart 

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ConnectionManager(android.content.Context context, android.os.Handler handler) 

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void closeWifiRadio()
      close WIFI radio
      void connect(NetworkModel network)
      do connect of WIFI/3G
      split policy network and hotspot network
      if already connected, notify to ServerController already connected message
      3G connection include WiFi radio on and WiFi radio off, to Ophone cannot open 3G radio, so notify to user open instead
      void connect(NetworkModel network, boolean isHotspot)
      do connect of WIFI/3G
      split policy network and hotspot network
      if already connected, notify to ServerController already connected message
      3G connection include WiFi radio on and WiFi radio off, to Ophone cannot open 3G radio, so notify to user open instead
      void onStart()
      start the manager
      void onStart(boolean isHotspot, android.os.Handler handler) 
      void onStop()
      stop the manager
      void onStop(boolean isHotspot) 
      void openWifiRadio()
      open WIFI radio
      void resume3GConnection(NetworkModel network)
      reconnect 3g network
      boolean startScanResult()
      scan WIFI and return the result

        public void connect(NetworkModel network)
        do connect of WIFI/3G
        split policy network and hotspot network

      • connect

        public void connect(NetworkModel network,
           boolean isHotspot)
        do connect of WIFI/3G
        split policy network and hotspot network
        if already connected, notify to ServerController already connected message
        3G connection include WiFi radio on and WiFi radio off, to Ophone cannot open 3G radio, so notify to user open instead
        参数:
        network -
        isHotspot -
